Movie.controllers

Class CategoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Movie.controllers.CategoryController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/category")
public class CategoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to do interactions with the MySQL database using the CategoryDao class.

 @ResponseBody

      • create

        @RequestMapping(value="/create/{name}/{description}")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String create(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                      @PathVariable(value="description")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String description)
        Create a new category and save it in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - New category's name
        description - The description of the new category.
        Returns:
        A string describing if the category is successfully created or not.

      • getByName

                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Movie.models.Category getByName(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String name)
        Get the category having the passed name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be searched in the database.
        Returns:
        The category, or null if the category is not found.

      • getByID

 @ResponseBody
public Movie.models.Category getByID(@PathVariable(value="categoryID")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long categoryID)
        Get the category having the passed id.
        Parameters:
        categoryID - The category id to be searched in the database.
        Returns:
        The category, or null if the movie is not found.

      • getMoviesByCategory

        @RequestMapping(value="/getMoviesByCategory/{categoryID}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<Movie.models.Movie> getMoviesByCategory(@PathVariable(value="categoryID")
                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.Long categoryID)
        Get the movies in the category.
        Parameters:
        categoryID - The category id to be searched in the database.
        Returns:
        The list of movie in the category, or null if the category is not found or there is no movie in it.
